attributes.action: Scrap Abingdon Town Centre  New Traffic System.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The New Transport Strategy in Abingdon Town Centre has caused so many problems,there is so much more Traffic congestion than there was in the first place,it was so much better the old way,not only is it a problem for residents its also so causing a big loss in trade for businesses in abingdon...
